standardLabel.description: An endless Tetra-X mode where you stack lines as the game increases speed

standardDescription.message: Staple auf bis Sie fallen! Versuche so viele Linien wie möglich zu löschen, bevor die Geschwindigkeit Sie überwältigt.
standardDescription.description: Feel free to take any liberties as long you can accurately describe the mode in a way that's localized to the language.

proLabel.description: A Tetra-X mode where you try and clear a line goal with an intense speed

proDescription.message: An dieser Stelle sterben Puzzle-Meister. Die Geschwindigkeit in diesem Modus ist super schnell; Blinke und Sie können sterben!
proDescription.description: Feel free to take any liberties as long you can accurately describe the mode in a way that's localized to the language.

nightOfNightsXLabel.description: A Tetra-X mode that has crazy effects synced to Night of Nights that tries to distract the player

nightOfNightsXDescription.message: Dieser Modus hat stark blinkende Lichter. Versuchen Sie, die Dauer von Night of Nights zu überleben, während das Spiel verrückte Ablenkungen verursacht!
nightOfNightsXDescription.description: Feel free to take any liberties as long you can accurately describe the mode in a way that's localized to the language.
